references.paper_title: BEHAVE: Dataset and method for tracking human object interactions
references.reason: This paper introduces the BEHAVE dataset, a crucial resource for training and evaluating the InterDreamer model's ability to generate human-object interactions.

references.paper_title: Generating diverse and natural 3d human motions from text
references.reason: This paper is highly influential to the current work, as it introduces a crucial text-to-motion model which is leveraged by InterDreamer to generate text-aligned 3D human motion.

This foundational paper on large language models provides theoretical backing and practical insights into how large language models, like GPT-4, can be utilized effectively within InterDreamer's framework.
This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a core component of many of the underlying methods used in this paper's framework for synthesizing human motions and object dynamics.

references.paper_title: MotionDiffuse: Text-driven human motion generation with diffusion model
references.reason: This paper provides a crucial text-to-motion model which is leveraged by the current work to generate human-object interaction sequences aligned with text descriptions.
